Fire + Wind = Smoke
Smoke + Wind = Cloud
Cloud + Fire = Lightning
Fire + Lightning = Sun
Sun + Wind = Sunflower
Smoke + Sunflower = Smoke Signal
c + o = u
n + o = t
L + i = n  // 13



Gen 1 - 32 Elements -> 32 Total Elements
Gen 2 - 109 Elements -> 141 Total Elements
Gen 3 - 376 Elements -> 517 Total Elements
Gen 4 - 1143 Elements -> 1660 Total Elements
Gen 5 - 3350 Elements -> 5010 Total Elements
Gen 6 - 0 Elements -> 5010 Total Elements
